mapper.select: select r.no as no, r.rep_no as repNo, r.rep_category as category, r.user_id as userId, r.rep_contents as contents, r.rep_status as status, r.create_date as createDate, u.user_profile as profile from reply r, planner_user u where r.rep_category = 'PLANNER' and no = #{value} and r.user_id = u.user_id order by r.create_date
mapper.insert: insert into board (board_no, user_id, board_category, board_contents, plan_no) values (board_seq.nextval, #{userId}, 'PLANNER', #{contents}, #{planNo})
mapper.select: select b.board_no as no, b.user_id as userId, b.board_category as category, b.board_title as title, b.board_contents as contents, b.board_view as "view", b.create_date as createDate, b.board_status as status, b.plan_no as planNo, u.user_profile as profile from board b, planner_user u where board_category = 'PLANNER' and plan_no = #{value} and b.user_id = u.user_id order by b.create_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply (no, rep_no, rep_category, user_id, rep_contents, rep_status) values (#{boardNo}, reply_seq.nextval, #{category}, #{userId}, #{contents}, 'NORMAL')
